LD-AGW SACLOS Missile Low Drag Advanced Guided Weapon, or LD-AGW is one of the final product of Next-Generation Attack Munition(NGAM). 
Fetures a SACLOS guidance system, means it can follow the central axis of the turret to fly to target. 
Installed a standard Proximity HE-F Warhead. Can insert other warheads 
Can be used as a vehicle for Omega Warhead 
Max Guidance Duration 15s
